original_text: You must also use acacia wood to make bars to fix across the boards. Make five bars for the south side of the tabernacle, 27 five bars for the north side, and five bars for the west side at the back of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 너는 조각목으로 띠를 만들지니 성막 이쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개요

sentences.original_text: You must also use acacia wood
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 아카시아 나무를 사용해야 한다

sentences.original_text: to make bars to fix across the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 판들 위에 가로로 놓을 막대기를 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: Make five bars for the south side
sentences.korean_translation: 남쪽을 위해 다섯 개의 막대기를 만들라

sentences.original_text: five bars for the north side
and five bars for the west side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 서쪽을 위해 다섯 개의 막대기

sentences.original_text: at the back of the tabernacle
